channel.title: Posts on Connor Shade
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Connor Shade

item.title: Intro Post
item.description: Welcome. This is my blog for the time being. Content Expect content to be: projects I work on, stuff I do, focused on tech. Hosting The address (connorshade.com) should never change, but the theme and hosting provider may. Right now I’m “hosting” on Github pages - posts are built with Hugo and I’m using the bear cub theme because it seems simple enough. I tried to use Gruvbox but the idea of installing nvm to install node to install npm to install >100 dependencies to compile a webpage is disgusting, despite how nice the page looks.
